channel.title: Anyone else having a problem with the mobile theme?
channel.description: Not sure if anyone else is having it, but whenever I tap the home icon, it just refreshes the section I'm currently on, it doesn't bring me back to the board index. Is anybody else experiencing it?

item.title: Anyone else having a problem with the mobile theme?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Not sure if anyone else is having it, but whenever I tap the home icon, it just refreshes the section I’m currently on, it doesn’t bring me back to the board index. Is anybody else experiencing it?

Read full topic
